welcome_message_body: Welcome to Tagum, Philippines! Get ready to experience the charm of our vibrant city, known for its rich culture, beautiful natural attractions, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Tagum has to offer.

restaurants.name: Yuyu Café
restaurants.description: Yuyu Café is a café located in City of Tagum.
restaurants.address: National Hwy (corner Quirante Dos), 8100 Tagum City, Davao del Norte
